faqSection.title: Frequently Asked Questions About Buying a 3BHK Flat in Sector 90 Gurugram
faqSection.description: Get instant answers to the most common queries regarding price, legality, connectivity, and amenities associated with residential flats in this rapidly developing sector.

faqs.question: What is the typical price range for a 3BHK Flat For Sale in Sector 90 Gurugram
faqs.answer: The price of a 3BHK flat in Sector 90 generally varies significantly based on factors like the project builder, carpet area, specific amenities provided, and the current stage of construction. Typically prices start from a certain baseline and move upwards for luxury and larger units. It is best to consult our property experts for the most current and accurate pricing tailored to your requirements and desired project.

faqs.question: Is Sector 90 a good location for long-term real estate investment in Gurugram
faqs.answer: Yes Sector 90 is considered an excellent location for long-term investment due to its strategic position in New Gurugram and its close proximity to the Dwarka Expressway and NH 48. Consistent infrastructure development and high demand from working professionals ensure strong capital appreciation potential over the next 5 to 10 years. The area is marked for substantial growth.

faqs.question: Are the 3BHK projects in Sector 90 RERA registered and safe to invest in
faqs.answer: The majority of reputable and large-scale residential projects offering 3BHK flats in Sector 90 are indeed RERA registered. We exclusively partner with developers who comply with all regulatory requirements ensuring transparency and the safety of your investment. Always verify the RERA registration number before finalizing any purchase.

faqs.question: What kind of amenities can I expect when buying a 3BHK flat here
faqs.answer: Standard amenities often include 24x7 security surveillance, power backup, dedicated parking spaces, clubhouses, swimming pools, gymnasiums, and landscaped gardens. Premium projects also offer sports facilities like tennis courts, jogging tracks, and specialized recreational areas for senior citizens and children ensuring a holistic lifestyle for all residents.

faqs.question: How is the connectivity of Sector 90 Gurugram to major Gurgaon NCR landmarks
faqs.answer: Connectivity is a major strength of Sector 90. It offers fast access to NH 48 and the Dwarka Expressway facilitating smooth commutes to Gurgaon's Indira Gandhi International Airport Cyber Hub and key business districts. It is strategically placed to benefit from current and future rapid transit developments further boosting accessibility across the region.

faqs.question: Are there ready-to-move 3BHK flats available in Sector 90 or are they mostly under construction
faqs.answer: Sector 90 offers a healthy mix of both ready-to-move RTM and under-construction residential projects for 3BHK configurations. Ready-to-move options allow for immediate occupancy while under-construction units often provide more flexible payment plans and lower entry prices. Our listings clearly specify the possession status for your ease of search.

faqs.question: What are the common carpet area sizes for a 3BHK flat in this sector
faqs.answer: The carpet area for 3BHK flats in Sector 90 typically ranges depending on the specific project and design philosophy of the developer. Generally you can expect competitive and comfortable sizes that align with modern family needs often offering spacious living rooms and bedrooms. Detailed floor plans specifying carpet area are available upon request for specific properties.

faqs.question: What is the process for securing financing or a home loan for a property in Sector 90
faqs.answer: Securing financing for a 3BHK flat here is straightforward as most projects are approved by leading national banks and financial institutions. Our advisors can assist you in connecting with reputable lenders to explore competitive home loan options favorable interest rates and necessary documentation requirements for a smooth approval process.

faqs.question: Is Sector 90 prone to water logging or infrastructure issues during the monsoon season
faqs.answer: Due to modern planning and robust drainage systems implemented in new developments Sector 90 residential areas typically experience minimal infrastructure issues like water logging compared to older parts of Gurugram. Developers prioritize resilient engineering ensuring comfort and safety throughout the year even during heavy rainfall events.

faqs.question: Can Non-Resident Indians NRI purchase a 3BHK Flat in Sector 90 Gurugram
faqs.answer: Yes Non-Resident Indians are fully permitted to purchase residential property including 3BHK flats in Sector 90 Gurugram subject to fulfilling standard governmental and RBI guidelines. Our dedicated NRI desk provides specialized consultation services to guide overseas clients through the entire documentation and purchasing process efficiently and legally.
